entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JsonIgnore attribute has no effect on init-only properties in source generation mode #101877
  • Negative numeric parsing inconsistencies / can't parse standard Windows format option #101873
  • [API Proposal]: Add new Environment properties to detect argv[0] #101872

Closed

  • Request timed out #100062
  • ASP.NET Core 6.0 Crash in long running 0x80131506 #95108
    9.0.0
  • ConvertDllsToWebCil fails ugly for invalid assembly #101154
    9.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanDestinationFunctions_SpecialValues #101731
    9.0.0
  • System.Numerics.Tensors.Tests.SingleGenericTensorPrimitives.SpanScalarDestination_SpecialValues fails #101721
    9.0.0
  • Test failure Assert.All() Failure: 12 out of 256 items in the collection did not pass #98732
    9.0.0
  • Expose DOTNET_JitNoInline in Release #100909
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Specify that `0x` is case-invariant in the Convert class #101876
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Fix check for AppleClang in src/native/libs and fix warnings #101875
    needs-area-label
  • Support loading standalone GC from an absolute path using a new config named DOTNET_GCPath #101874
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [wasm] Add custom mmap/munmap implementation for anonymous mappings #101871
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Arm64/SVE: Mark operation inside ConditionalSelect as delay-free #101870
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport crossgen2 changes) #101869
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Remove old JIT perf lab experiments; add block layout experiment #101852
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • `explosed` -> `exposed` #101836
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • [browser] Fix ConvertDllsToWebCil stack dump on bad input to be error message with input path #101162
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Ensure the scalar Reciprocal*Estimate APIs use AVX512 where possible #101800
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT: Test RPO-based block layout in runtime-jit-experimental #101851
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: profile checking through inlining #101834
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Optimize 'ConvertOrWidenPrimitivesEnumsAndPointersIfPossible' #101858
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Integrate naot-llvm into workload manifest #101801
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 9.0.0
  • Add tests for OAVariantLib #101841
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add BFloat16 #98643
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Arm64/Sve: Implement SVE Math Min*/Max* APIs #101859
    arm-sve
  • [release/8.0-staging] Transition to 1ES templates work (Backport #92901) #101703
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Enable cross-block local assertion prop for natural loops #101763
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test #101822
    area-Infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • .NET Framework build job test failure #40160
  • Darwin Build_Release failure on Helix tests - Tests timing out #40074
  • Test failure - AllWebProjectsRestoreAndBuild fails with Unbalanced Condition for F# MVC templates #40073
  • dotnet-watch tests failing #40006
  • Build_Components_WithDesktopMSBuild_Works appears to be failing flakily #39960
  • GivenThatWeHaveAPackageReferenceWithAliases tests failing in CI #39068
  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Why the product version has a long suffix? #18294
  • MSBuild 17.9.4 no longer reports code style errors in build #39142

PullRequests

Updated

  • Aspire #40111
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix proposed type inference rules for spans and arrays and clarify explicit conversions #8094

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Duplicate `.override method` generation #73338
  • Autocompletion prioritizes more distant entry #73337

PullRequests

Created

  • Improve C# grammar generator. #73340
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Always use DiagnosticHelper.Create for diagnostics with options #73339
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged

Merged

  • Add tasks for running a new vscode instance with a specific language server #69865
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Add public API for ref like type parameters #73335
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Add helper for common pattern of producing an array. #73336
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Statically bind invocations in presence of dynamic arguments only for local functions #73314
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Razor fallback changes #73001
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11
  • Improve analyzer consistency check message #73329
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, 17.11

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: single_query #55530
  • Add configuration for Identity API endpoints #55529
  • Perf regression: endpoint, fortunes #55528

Closed

  • Shared memory between created TestServers of individual WebApplicationFactories #55497
  • Perf improvement: mvc, plaintext #55344
  • Perf regression: https, multiple_queries #55424
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #55522

PullRequests

Merged

  • Ensure OutputCaching generates a documentation file #55170
    area-middleware, 9.0-preview5

Updated

  • Allow HTTP2 encoder to split headers across frames #55322
    community-contribution, area-networking

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Windows] FlexLayout crashes when using a custom display scale factor value (regression) #22209

Closed

  • ListViewItem doesn't exists any more #22202
  • [XVS][VSM][MAUI]There were 3 errors when building and canceling solution several times #18636
    .NET 8 + Servicing
  • vs2022 .net8.0 mauiAPP can't run #19084
  • [BUG] On Android (when also connected to Mac), resizetizer does not often run on time on first rebuild / empty obj directory, leading to processing of AndroidManifest failing (Visual Studio 17.10.0 Preview 2 / .NET 9.0 Preview 2.0) #21542

PullRequests

Created

  • Added a support for GradientBrushes on Shape.Stroke #22208
    community ✨

Updated

  • For XAML Hot Reload: Add public method to clear ResourceDictionary cache #22157
    area/tooling ⚙️, partner/hot-reload-xaml
  • Changed order of calls to properly close MediaPicker Activity / ViewController and set the picker result #21998
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #21092
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-04
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • TimeOnly.FromDateTime() could not be translated in EF Core 8 #33678
  • Complex property causes "The multi-part identifier "xxx" could not be bound" after GroupBy + Select(x => x.First()) #33183
    9.0.0-preview3

Updated

  • Migration for linq To sql with updateCheck #32045
    Backlog
  • In precompiled operator interceptors, access closure fields via unsafe accessor when possible #33418
    Backlog
  • How to set comment on JSON column #33375
    9.0.0
  • EF Core 8.0.3 produces incorrect idempotent migration script #33337
    8.0.x
  • Disposing a "failed" pooled context throws ObjectDisposedException #33326
    9.0.0
  • EF 8 migration 'up' method being executed twice. Undocumented breaking change? #33279
    9.0.0
  • UnexpectedTrailingResultSetWhenSaving with Temporal Tables and Concurrency Token when updating multiple entity types in context #33243
    9.0.0
  • dotnet-ef isn't packed properly on MacOS #33165
    Backlog
  • Holistic end-to-end pagination feature #33160
    Backlog
  • Reporting TagWith / TagWithCallsite to OpenTelemetry? #33149
    Backlog
  • JSON columns throws Invalid token type: 'StartObject' exception with AsNoTrackingWithIdentityResolution() #33073
    9.0.0
  • Add testing for Find/FindAsync with default QueryTrackingBehavior #32762
    Backlog
  • Sql Server - LINQ Contains returns false positive results for string values larger than column size #32735
    8.0.x
  • Allow passing entity type instances to ExecuteUpdate #32719
    Backlog
  • Type converters, comparers etc. cannot be supported if they contain expressions incompatible with expresion tree #32717
    Backlog
  • Clean up default mappings #32853
    Backlog
  • The same alias is sometimes used in multiple (non-conflicting) aliases #32778
    Backlog
  • Different LazyLoad/Proxies behavior with AutoMapper between EF6 and EF Core #32708
    Backlog
  • Allow conventions to react to sequence operations #32709
    Backlog
